work.summary: For beginner French classes, I am responsible for marking various works of the students and provide helpful feedback related to grammar, style, and compositions.

work.position: Instructional Design Support and Academic Excellence Partner
work.summary: I was responsible for creating instructional materials for grades 1 through 12 in all subjects as well as designing an effective online course for all high school students.

I am involved in the creation of a digital edition of Old English artifacts related to the Ruthwell Cross. I assists in all aspects of the project such as coding, research, and innovative problem solving.

volunteer.summary: Surved as treasurer and lead the finance committee for The Meliorist—the University of Lethbridge student journal.
